des: "This is an easy, delicious spread that adults and kids love. It's a staple at my family's parties, showers, and luncheons. Spread on white sandwich bread or party rolls (or serve with crackers or plain pita chips)."
ins: Mash asparagus in bowl; pour off any remaining liquid.  Mix in the cream cheese, almonds, mayonnaise, and onion  until thoroughly blended. Cover, and refrigerate until serving.
